about_the_game:
Music from the game Twilight Oracle was composed and produced by Ben Cooper, with additional music by Paul Darbot and Brian Manown.

Step into the mesmerizing world of Twilight Oracle with our definitive soundtrack! Immerse yourself in the enchanting melodies that breathe life into the magic of the adventure. This soundtrack is not just a collection of songs - it's a portal back to the heart of the game, allowing you to relive every thrilling moment through its meticulously crafted soundscapes and fantasy-laden score. Each track is a musical journey, evoking the emotions and magic of Twilight Oracle with every listen. Let the power of the game's soundtrack captivate your senses and transport you back to the extraordinary realms of adventure and wonder!

This definitive soundtrack features all the songs of adventure and magic from Twilight Oracle.

Journey to a strange world in search of the fabled Oracle in this fantasy comedy point-and-click adventure. Play as Leo, a struggling student with the ability to breathe underwater, and explore a desert island and the depths of an alien ocean to uncover your school’s dark past.

name: Twilight Oracle Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 275 MB available space
